G

generateKey1() - Method in class miniaesdemo.EncryptionDetails
This method generates the first round key using the initial key.
generateKey2() - Method in class miniaesdemo.EncryptionDetails
This method generates the second round key, using the first round key.
generateKeys(int[]) - Method in class miniaesdemo.EncryptionDetails
This method takes in an initial key as a parameter and generates the rest of the keys using the EncryptionDetails.generateKey1() and EncryptionDetails.generateKey2() methods.
generateRandomKey() - Method in class miniaesdemo.RandomKey
This method generates a random 16-bit binary key using Math.random().
getInverseNibbleSubValue(int) - Static method in class miniaesdemo.Tables
This method takes a value and using a nibble substitution table, returns the inverted substituted value.
getInverseSBoxValue(int) - Static method in class miniaesdemo.Tables
This method gives the inverted substitution value of our input from Rijndael's Inverted S-BOX table.

getKey2() - Method in class miniaesdemo.EncryptionDetails
